variable.name: abao1
variable.description: The antero-posterior diameter of the abdominal aorta 5 cm above the aorto-common iliac bifurcation.

variable.name: abao2
variable.description: The trasverse diameter of the abdominal aorta 5 cm above the aorto-common iliac bifurcation.

variable.name: abao3
variable.description: The antero-posterior diameter of the abdominal aorta just above the aorto-common iliac bifurcation.

variable.name: abao4
variable.description: The transverse diameter of the abdominal aorta just above the aorto-common iliac bifurcation.

variable.name: aao1
variable.description: The antero-posterior diameter of the ascending thoracic aorta obtained at the level of the right pulmonary artery.

variable.name: aao2
variable.description: The transverse diameter of the ascending thoracic aorta obtained at the level of the right pulmonary artery.

variable.name: dao1
variable.description: The antero-posterior diameter of the descending thoracic aorta obtained at the level of the right pulmonary artery.

variable.name: mpa
variable.description: The maximum diamter of the main pulmonary artery obtained at the level of the right pulmonary artery.

variable.name: dao2
variable.description: The transverse diameter of the descending thoracic aorta obtained at the level of the right pulmonary artery.
